name: Roller Die
description:
Survive as long as possible in a strange abandoned mall populated exclusively by you, GAMBLING-ADDICTED PUNK SKELETONS, and 100 EXACT REPLICAS OF THE SAME TRASHCAN AND TABLE.

DO YOU HAVE WHAT IT TAKES TO AVOID SKELETONS UNTIL YOU GET BORED???

Bump skeletons to knock them apart and steal their precious dice. Every die you (or another skeleton) picks up adds its face value to the randomly rolled "Role".

WASD to move, SPACE to quick stop.

"Role" dice results are as follows:

HARM - hurts you but gives skeletons health.

HEAL - opposite of HARM; heals you, but hurts skeletons.

KILL - kills skeletons on the map.

SPAWN - spawn skeletons.

SPEED - increases speed.

SLOW - decreases speed.
